description:
Otako greets Galko when she enters the classroom, but Galko doesn’t open her mouth and responds by gesture.
Galko finally opens her mouth when Otako asks why she’s not talking.
She explains that she’s concerned about her double teeth because the main character in the movie was too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est vrai que tu as peur des piercings ?
Is It True You`re Scared of Holes?
穴がコワいって本当ですか?
